item.description:
Alan has offered his home to those who would like to gather for a New Year's Eve celebration. This will be a BYO event and we can all pitch in some snacks and goodies and enjoy each other's company and Alan's hospitality.
Please plan to join us. More details to follow for those who choose to come along. Please RSVP as soon as you know you will attend. Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: I will forward the address as we get closer to the event. Alan lives near Chelmsford center, easily accessible from 495 or Route 3.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: New Year's Eve House Party
